comment:
* Used to indicate an action to take when hitting a malicious URL. Instances of this class are * created by the WebView and passed to {@link android.webkit.WebViewClient#onSafeBrowsingHit}. The * host application must call {@link #showInterstitial(boolean)}, {@link #proceed(boolean)}, or * {@link #backToSafety(boolean)} to set the WebView's response to the Safe Browsing hit. * *

* If reporting is enabled, all reports will be sent according to the privacy policy referenced by * {@link android.webkit.WebView#getSafeBrowsingPrivacyPolicyUrl()}.

methods.name: public abstract void showInterstitial(boolean allowReporting)
methods.comment:
* Display the default interstitial.
     *
     * @param allowReporting {@code true} if the interstitial should show a reporting checkbox.

methods.name: public abstract void proceed(boolean report)
methods.comment:
* Act as if the user clicked the "visit this unsafe site" button.
     *
     * @param report {@code true} to enable Safe Browsing reporting.

methods.name: public abstract void backToSafety(boolean report)
methods.comment:
* Act as if the user clicked the "back to safety" button.
     *
     * @param report {@code true} to enable Safe Browsing reporting.
